definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Unlike most other fish, they are monogamous and mate for life.
sentences.chinese: 不像其他的魚類，它們是一夫一妻制並終生廝守。

sentences.english: There are apparently some misconceptions about this whole monogamy thing.
sentences.chinese: 很多人顯然對一夫一妻制存在着誤解。

sentences.english: The same goes for bisexuals in monogamous relationships.
sentences.chinese: 這在雙性戀的一夫一妻制關係中也是一樣的。

sentences.english: He didn't believe in monogamy any more than he believed in god.
sentences.chinese: 他不相信一夫一妻制，正如他對上帝缺乏信仰。

sentences.english: Simplified marriage procedures have led to a rise in bigamy.
sentences.chinese: 簡化了的一夫一妻制導致了重婚發生的可能性。

sentences.english: Apparently that monogamous mammalian instinct is weak.
sentences.chinese: 顯然哺乳動物的一夫一妻制天性很薄弱。

sentences.english: So birds are monogamous but they cheat as well, within limits.
sentences.chinese: 所以鳥類是一夫一妻制，但它們也背叛，有限度地。

sentences.english: Our understanding of monogamy draws heavily on birds rather than mammals.
sentences.chinese: 我們對一夫一妻制的理解主要來自鳥類而非哺乳類。

sentences.english: Marmosets are monogamous, and both parents participate in the care of their offspring.
sentences.chinese: 狨猴行一夫一妻制，且夫妻倆共同照顧幼兒。

sentences.english: B eing tested for HIV and being faithful in marriage and monogamous relationships
sentences.chinese: 檢測艾滋病病毒，忠貞於婚姻，實行一夫一妻制。

sentences.english: Gibbons are monogamous to the point of piety.
sentences.chinese: 長臂猿則實行的是虔誠的一夫一妻制。

sentences.english: The equal relationship in a family can be realized among proletarians .
sentences.chinese: 封建一夫一妻制在農民家庭得到實現。

sentences.english: Of all the sexual perversions, monogamy is the most unnatural.
sentences.chinese: 在所有對性的曲解中，一夫一妻制是最不合常理的。

sentences.english: Bisexuals can never be happy in a monogamous relationship.
sentences.chinese: 雙性戀在一夫一妻制的情況下不會幸福的。

sentences.english: The feudalistic monogamy is realized in the farmer's family.
sentences.chinese: 封建一夫一妻制在農民家庭得到實現。

definition: formal betrothal (in which the boy's family sends presents to the girl's family)
to regard men as superior to women (idiom)
trial marriage/to live together before deciding whether to marry
